snippet: Those who thought Joba Chamberlain would become a sedentary dad with his son, Karter, after a gruesome mishap three months ago failed to take full measure of the man and his mantra.
abstract: New York Yankees pitcher Joba Chamberlain, who is coming back from elbow surgery and a dislocated ankle, throws his first bating practice session at the team's minor league complex; Chamberlain sustained the severe ankle injury in March during a trampoline outing with his son Karter, but says his son is his most important priority and that he has no regrets.
lead_paragraph: Those who thought Joba Chamberlain would become a sedentary dad with his son, Karter, after a gruesome mishap three months ago failed to take full measure of the man and his mantra.

headline.seo: Yankees’ Chamberlain Sidelined as a Pitcher, Not as a Father
headline.main: Sidelined as a Pitcher, but Not as a Father
headline.print_headline: Sidelined As a Pitcher, But Not As a Father
